thread.title: Johnny Depp Is 'Quite Worried' About Daughter Lily-Rose's Fashion Career - Yahoo Celebrity UK
thread.title_full: Johnny Depp Is 'Quite Worried' About Daughter Lily-Rose's Fashion Career - Yahoo Celebrity UK

title: Johnny Depp Is 'Quite Worried' About Daughter Lily-Rose's Fashion Career - Yahoo Celebrity UK
text:
etonline-yahoopartner : 
Johnny Depp only wants what’s best for his daughter, 16-year-old Lily-Rose, and he’s not so sure it’s a modeling career. 
“To be honest, I’m quite worried,” the actor candidly revealed to Germany’s Gala magazine (via The Daily Telegraph ). 
“I wasn’t expecting all this to happen to Lily-Rose, especially not at this age,” he said. “But it’s her passion and she’s having fun.” 
WATCH: Johnny Depp’s Daughter Lily-Rose and Natalie Portman Look So Much Alike It’s Scary! 
Rose’s catwalk career has certainly been taking off. Depp’s only daughter, whose mother is Chanel muse Vanessa Paradis , was recently featured in a campaign called The Self Evident Truths Project , which will showcase people who identify as “anything other than 100% straight.” 
In March, Rose appeared at Chanel’s 2014/15 Metiers d'Art Collection show. Last month, she modeled the fashion house’s Pearl eyewear collection for her own Chanel campaign. The teen model will also star alongside Natalie Portman in Planetarium , a 1930s drama. The two play sisters. 
WATCH: Amber Heard Brought to Tears While Handing Out Hearing Aids With Johnny Depp 
Though the Pirates of the Caribbean actor might be apprehensive about Rose’s budding career, in the end, “she knows I’m always there for her,” he told Gala . 
Could Johnny Depp’s heart be any bigger? It could be! And it was here, during a surprise visit to the Cilento Children’s Hospital in Brisbane. Watch the video below.
